item.title: Go concurrency simplified. Part 4: Post office as a data pipeline
item.description: Go concurrency simplified. Part 4: Post office as a data pipeline Hello there! The main part of my moving to a new place adventures seems to be behind. Since I’m still waiting for a furniture delivery, I’m writing this post while lying on the floor using my foam camping mat as a sofa. It’s not the most ideal setup, but it works. Anyway, I feel like today is the right time to start working on Part 4 of the “Go concurrency simplified” series.
